violations: Missing PPE: One worker appears to not be wearing a hard hat.
Improper equipment usage: A worker is carrying a large panel without assistance or proper lifting equipment.
Workers in dangerous positions: A worker is standing close to a stack of potentially unstable materials.
locations: Central area: Worker without a hard hat.
Left side: Worker carrying a large panel.
Near the stacked materials on the right: Worker standing near the hazard.
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear the appropriate PPE, including hard hats, at all times.
Use lifting equipment or have additional personnel assist with carrying large panels.
Rearrange or secure stacked materials to minimize the risk of collapse and ensure workers maintain a safe distance.
